code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import DialogContent from'@mui/joy/DialogContent';import Typography from'@mui/joy/Typography';import _ from'lodash';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SumBalance(_ref){let{playersData}=_ref;const totalIn=_.sumBy(playersData,p=>Number(p.start_balance));const totalOut=_.sumBy(playersData,p=>Number(p.end_balance));playersData.map(p=>console.log(typeof p.start_balance==='number'));const totalZero=totalOut===totalIn;const text="The sum of in and out is ".concat(totalOut-totalIn);const jsx=totalZero?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"soft",color:"success",startDecorator:"\u2705",fontSize:"sm",sx:{'--Typography-gap':'0.5rem',p:1},children:text}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"soft",color:"danger",startDecorator:"\uD83D\uDEA8",fontSize:"sm",sx:{'--Typography-gap':'0.5rem',p:1},children:text});useEffect(()=>{},[playersData]);return jsx;}
